alert.note: Alert for Custer Co Plains; Northern Meade Co Plains; Northern Oglala Lakota; Pennington Co Plains; Southern Meade Co Plains; Southern Oglala Lakota; Southern Perkins; Sturgis, Piedmont Foothills (South Dakota) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS RapidCity (Western South Dakota and Northeastern Wyoming)
info.headline: Blizzard Warning issued December 26 at 1:24AM MST until December 26 at 8:00PM MST by NWS RapidCity
info.description: ...BLIZZARD WARNING NOW IN EFFECT UNTIL 8 PM MST THIS EVENING... * WHAT...Blizzard conditions. Additional snow accumulations of 3 to 5 inches and ice accumulations of a light glaze. Winds gusting as high as 60 mph. * WHERE...Portions of northwestern and southwestern South Dakota. This includes the Tribal Lands of the Pine Ridge Reservation. * WHEN...Until 8 PM MST this evening. * IMPACTS...Travel could be very difficult. Widespread blowing snow could significantly reduce visibility. Strong winds could cause damage to trees and power lines.
info.instruction: A Blizzard Warning means the combination of snow, blowing snow, and strong winds will create dangerous whiteout conditions. Road conditions are available on your smartphone from the 5 1 1 app for your state.
